page.title: 20Boughton's Future
page.content: The danger with our village is that it is fast becoming a middle class commuter estate. Most of the community work outside of this area and use the village as a peaceful retreat.This has resulted in a change in the group identity or composition of the population. The unity of the village has broken up into splinter groups;no longer does everyone know each other. Responsibility for social behaviour is weakened so that problems with youth or the elderly get harder to isolate and therefore remedy. There are events such as the carnival and annual show at the village hall which brings many people together, but beyond that, nobody wants to know.It is up to schools to try and forge the new community into a caring and once again whole society.
